translations.aboutBody: TypeSprout is a typing practice and growth website for grades 1â€“6 with zhâ€‘TW / zhâ€‘CN / enâ€‘US supportï¼Œ aiming to offer a safe and friendly environment for kids worldwide to practice inputï¼Œ understandingï¼Œ and expression.

home.aboutContent: Hi everyoneï¼Œ I'm Yves.Cï¼Œ a dad from Taiwan. The inspiration for TypeSprout came from watching my kids chat with friends around the world on Robloxâ€”I realized that typing is actually the first key for children to open up to a bigger world. So I created this web typing practice using no-code concepts + ChatGPT/AIï¼Œ adding little tree growth visual feedback: with every correct keystrokeï¼Œ the tree grows a littleï¼Œ turning daily efforts into visible achievements. In terms of contentï¼Œ I have organized commonly used words from grades 1-6 into selectable question banks; children can practice their native language and switch to English or other languages they want to practice in Settings. These words are filtered by AI according to grade difficulty. For adultsï¼Œ I have prepared an extended question bankï¼Œ currently including Bible API and AI-generated Bible scriptures (from free online resourcesï¼Œ accuracy may be limited)ï¼Œ and I will gradually add topics like famous quotes to make practice more interesting. In TypeSproutï¼Œ children will gradually accumulate points and daily efforts; the little tree on the screen will also thrive with their performanceï¼Œ forming a positive cycle of effort â†’ feedback â†’ re-engagement. I also designed a 5-day active challenge: practicing for 5 consecutive days will earn a small fruit reward. When achievements are visibleï¼Œ motivation will grow. This is the learning rhythm I want to share with children and you. For teachersï¼Œ I added a Class function on the personal pageï¼Œ allowing teachers to create classes and invite classmates to participateï¼Œ making practice feel more competitive. This is a small project maintained by me personally (no engineering backgroundï¼Œ mainly relying on ChatGPT/AI for guidance and collaboration). If you have suggestions or encounter problems during useï¼Œ please feel free to leave a message in the GitHub issues sectionï¼Œ and I will do my best to organize and solve them. Thank you all in advance. GitHub: https://github.com/yveschen001/typesprout-pubic/issues

charts.speedChartAriaLabel: Speed score trend chart: higher line means better performance

result.accuracyTooltip: Accuracy = correct chars Ã· total question chars. Note: untyped chars are also counted in totalï¼Œ so missing chars will lower accuracy.
result.scoreTooltip: Composite score = input speed of correct chars only. Calculation: speed (WPM/CPM) Ã— accuracy. Purpose: first stabilize accuracyï¼Œ then gradually increase speed.
result.chartDescription: Top: composite trend; Bottom: accuracy trend. First stabilize accuracy, then increase speed.

section4.advertisingCookies: Advertising Cookies: As mentioned aboveï¼Œ if we enable Google AdSenseï¼Œ Google will use cookies to display ads. You can visit Google's ad settings page (https://adssettings.google.com/) at any time to manage or opt out of personalized ads.
section4.functionalCookies: Functional Cookies: We use cookies to maintain your login status.

section5.contactChannel: Contact Channel: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your data rights (such as queryï¼Œ correctionï¼Œ deletion)ï¼Œ please submit requests through our official GitHub Issues page.
section5.importantReminder: Important Reminder: Please note that GitHub Issues is a public platform. To protect your personal privacyï¼Œ please absolutely do not leave any personal identification information in the Issue contentï¼Œ such as your email addressï¼Œ real nameï¼Œ or account screenshots. We only need you to provide your Username on TypeSprout and a description of the issue. We will not contact you through any private channels other than Issues.
section5.responseTime: Since this is a personally maintained projectï¼Œ we will respond as quickly as possible within our capabilities. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

voluntaryInfo.content: You may optionally provide your age rangeï¼Œ professional fieldï¼Œ languageï¼Œ or region. This information is not mandatory and is primarily intended to optimize question bank recommendationsï¼Œ for anonymous statistical analysisï¼Œ and leaderboard grouping. We do not require or verify the accuracy of this information.

technicalData.googleAdsense: Google AdSense (Advertising): We may use Google AdSense in the future to display ads to support website operating costs. Google and its partners may use Cookies (such as DoubleClick Cookie) to show personalized ads based on your past visit history.
technicalData.googleAnalytics: Google Analytics: We use this service to analyze website traffic to understand service usage. It collects anonymized information such as your IP addressï¼Œ browser typeï¼Œ operating systemï¼Œ pages visitedï¼Œ etc.

section1.principle: We adhere to the principle of minimalismï¼Œ collecting only the data necessary to maintain service operation:

googleAuth.title: Google Login Authentication
googleAuth.content: When you log in using your Google account, we only use Google's authentication service to verify your identity and create a unique anonymous user ID for you. We do not actively request, access, or store any personal privacy data from your Google account, such as your real name or address.

gameData.title: Game Data
gameData.content: Every typing practice score you perform on the website, including speed (WPM), accuracy, time used, etc. This data is associated with your anonymous user ID to generate your personal history and leaderboard.

section2.coreFunction: Core Function: Your anonymous user ID and game data are part of the core functionality of this serviceï¼Œ used to record your scoresï¼Œ provide historical chartsï¼Œ and global leaderboards.
section2.experienceOptimization: Experience Optimization: The ageï¼Œ professionï¼Œ and other information you voluntarily provide will be used to match you with more suitable typing practice question banks.
section2.serviceMaintenance: Service Maintenance: Technical data collected through Google Analytics helps us understand the website's operational status and fix potential issues.
section2.statisticalAnalysis: Statistical Analysis: We will anonymize and aggregate all user-voluntarily provided information to understand the overall profile of the user group and improve the service.

section3.crossBorderTransfer: Cross-Border Transfer: GitHub and Google Firebase servers may be located outside your country (e.g.ï¼Œ United States). By using this serviceï¼Œ you understand and agree that your data will be transmittedï¼Œ storedï¼Œ and processed on these overseas servers.
section3.dataRetention: Data Retention: Since this service is completely freeï¼Œ we cannot guarantee permanent data storage. We reserve the right to clear some or all user data without notice.
section3.storageLocation: Storage Location: This website's code is hosted on GitHubï¼Œ while your game data and voluntarily provided information are stored in Google Firebase's database.

privacy.introduction: Welcome to TypeSprout! This is a free typing practice website created by an individual developer out of interest. We understand that your privacy is crucialï¼Œ so this policy aims to explain what data we collect and how we will use this data.
privacy.notice: Please note: This service is non-profit in natureï¼Œ and all features are provided as is. If you do not agree to any terms of this privacy policyï¼Œ please stop using this service immediately. Continued use indicates that you have readï¼Œ understoodï¼Œ and agree to all contents of this policy.

leaderboard.tooltip:
ðŸ† How is the leaderboard calculated?
â€¢ Today: today's scores (local time)
â€¢ Yesterday: yesterday's scores (local time)
â€¢ Last week: Monday to Sunday of last week
â€¢ Last month: 1st to last day of last month

ðŸ“Š How are scores calculated?
â€¢ Composite score = max speed Ã— accuracy Ã— practice time
â€¢ Multiple practices on the same day are combined
â€¢ Longer practice time = higher score

ðŸ’¡ Tip: Practice a little every day and your tree will grow!

garden.historyRule1: Points are calculated from speed Ã— accuracy Ã— timeï¼Œ used to promote tree growth.
garden.historyRule2: The list below shows each earning recordï¼Œ making it easy for you to track your efforts.
garden.levelUpRule1: Practice daily to accumulate activity; the longer you typeï¼Œ the faster you grow.
garden.levelUpRule2: Maximum stage 5; if you can maintain stage 5 dailyï¼Œ you will continuously produce fruits.
garden.levelUpRule3: Collected fruits will provide platform rewards based on ranking; currently can use test time as score accumulation.
garden.pointsExplanation: How do points work? Generated from daily testsï¼Œ related to effective input timeï¼Œ speed and accuracy. Daily limit 100; short practice (â‰¥5 seconds and accuracy â‰¥30%) at least +1.
garden.recalculateActivityTooltip: What is Recalculate activity and stage? It will re-read your recent 5 days of test recordsï¼Œ calculate effective input minutesï¼Œ and update the activity list and current stage.

section7.content1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Serviceï¼Œ please raise them through our official GitHub Issues page: https://github.com/yveschen001/typesprout-pubic/issues
section7.warning: Please note that this is a public platformï¼Œ so please do not leave your personal privacy information on it.

section5.content2: We are not responsible for any loss or damage to your practice records or user dataï¼Œ nor do we guarantee permanent data preservation.
section5.content3: We reserve the right to modifyï¼Œ suspendï¼Œ or permanently terminate this service at any time for any reasonï¼Œ without prior notice.
section5.content1: The Service is provided on an "as is" basis without any warranties.
section5.title: 5. Disclaimer and Service Limitations

section2.listItem1: AI Generated Content: Some practice articles are analyzedï¼Œ collectedï¼Œ or generated by AI models (such as ChatGPT) for typing practice only.
section2.listItem2: Bible Texts: Some Bible question banks come from third-party API.Bible services. When that service is inaccessibleï¼Œ alternative texts may be generated by AI models.
section2.content1: The sole purpose of the Service is to provide typing skills practice. It is not an academic research or religious education tool. All content on the website serves this single purpose.
section2.content2: To provide a rich practice text, the content of the Service's question bank comes from multiple sources. We hereby specifically state:
section2.content3: The accuracy, completeness, and suitability as faith-based material are not guaranteed. Please understand it solely as practice text.
section2.title: 2. Description of the Service and Content Sources

section1.content1: Welcome to TypeSprout (hereinafter referred to as "the Service"). The Service is a free, non-profit project maintained by an individual developer, aimed at providing users (especially children and learners) with a simple online typing practice environment.
section1.content2: By accessing or using the Service, you signify that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by all the terms of this Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "these Terms"). If you do not agree to any part of these Terms, please immediately stop using the Service.
section1.title: 1. General Provisions and Acceptance of Terms

section3.content1: The Service is limited to personal and educational use, and is licensed for use in a non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable manner.
section3.content2: Commercial use of the Service, either directly or indirectly, is prohibited.
section3.title: 3. License and Restrictions

section4.content1: Users are responsible for properly managing their login information.
section4.content2: Actions that interfere with the normal operation of the Service and cheating are prohibited.
section4.title: 4. User Responsibilities
